handlers.name: handleUpdate
handleTypeChange

calls.name: onChange
items.map
arguments:
(item, i) =>
        i === index
          ? { ...item, type, value: type === 'file' ? '' : item.value, file: undefined }
          : item

handlers.name: handleFileSelect

calls.name: onChange
items.map
arguments:
(item, i) =>
        i === index ? { ...item, file, value: file.name } : item

state_fields.reasoning: useRef 'fileInputRefs' becomes non-reactive state (no re-render on change)

options.label: Message dispatch

options.label: Actor reference
